name: node-poweredup
description: A Node.js module to interface with LEGO Powered UP components.

scripts.docs: jsdoc2md dist/poweredup.js dist/lpf2hub.js dist/wedo2smarthub.js dist/boostmovehub.js dist/puphub.js dist/pupremote.js dist/duplotrainbase.js dist/hub.js dist/consts.js > DOCS.md
scripts.all: npm run build && npm run docs && npm run readme
